case_name_full: Cyrus BAILEY v. The STATE of Texas
attorneys: No attorney on appeal for appellant., Wesley Dice, State’s Atty., Austin, for the State.

opinions.opinion_text:
PER CURIAM.
The offense is burglary; the punishment, 5 years.
The record is before us without a statement of facts or bills of exception.
All the proceedings appearing regular and nothing being presented for Our review, the judgment of the trial court is affirmed.

court_short_name: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
court_full_name: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
